alert.note: Alert for Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lake, northwest Orange and northwestern Volusia Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Plymouth, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Pierson, Barberville, Cassia and DeLeon Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange
